The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland amid Iran's missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024."

## Actions
```
web_search("Netanyahu Poland October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest)) reported on January 9, 2025, that Poland will protect Benjamin Netanyahu from potential arrest, as he may attend the 80th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp on January 27, 2025. The article mentions an arrest warrant issued by the International Criminal Court (ICC) for alleged war crimes. <image:1>

The Los Angeles Times ([https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event](https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event)) also reported on January 9, 2025, that the Polish President is seeking protection for Netanyahu if he attends the Auschwitz anniversary event. DW.COM ([https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468](https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468)) reported on January 22, 2025, that the Polish government guaranteed safe passage to Netanyahu, should he attend the event, and that Netanyahu was not planning to attend. <image:k> <image:k>


## Elaboration
The evidence indicates that in January 2025, Poland was preparing to protect Netanyahu from potential arrest, possibly related to an ICC warrant, if he attended the Auschwitz anniversary. However, the evidence does not mention any events from October 1, 2024, or an Iranian missile attack. The evidence also states that Netanyahu was not planning to attend the event.

Therefore, the claim cannot be verified based on the provided evidence. The evidence does not support the claim that Netanyahu fled to Poland on October 1, 2024.

To verify the claim, information about Netanyahu's whereabouts on October 1, 2024, and any related events, such as an Iranian missile attack, would be needed.


## Actions
```
web_search("Iran missile attack Israel October 1 2024")
web_search("Netanyahu whereabouts October 1 2024")
```

Content: "Hezbollah said it carried out rocket attacks on Israel, while Israel launched airstrikes on Beirut's suburbs.**

A drone targets the Israeli prime minister's house during new barrages with Hezbollah
=====================================================================================

  

Updated October 19, 20248:20 PM ET Originally published October 19, 20248:58 AM ET

By 

[The Associated Press](https://www.npr.org/people/101453150/the-associated-press)

  !Smoke rises from an Israeli airstrike on Dahiyeh, in the southern suburb of Beirut, Lebanon, on Saturday. **Hussein Malla/AP** ****hide caption****

****toggle caption****

Hussein Malla/AP

JERUSALEM — Israel's government said a drone targeted Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s house Saturday, with no casualties, as fighting with Lebanon-based Hezbollah and Gaza-based Hamas showed no pause after the [killing of the Hamas mastermind](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/18/nx-s1-5157608/israel-hamas-sinwar-gaza-future)
 of last year’s Oct. <image:13883>](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/17/nx-s1-5155887/hamas-yahya-sinwar-israel-gaza)

Hezbollah didn't claim responsibility but said it carried out several rocket attacks on Israel. The militant group’s longtime leader, Hassan Nasrallah, was [killed in an Israeli airstrike](https://www.npr.org/2024/09/28/g-s1-25311/analysis-hassan-nasrallahs-killing-transforms-an-already-deadly-regional-conflict)
 in September, and Israel sent ground troops into Lebanon this month.

A 50-year-old man was hit by shrapnel and killed in northern Israel, and four other people were wounded, Israel’s medical services said.

Lebanon’s state-run National News Agency said an Israeli airstrike on an apartment in eastern Baaloul village killed five people, including the mayor of nearby Sohmor village. <image:13882>](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/15/nx-s1-5154065/israel-north-gaza-food-aid-block)

SummarizeSummariesPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved web sources, each one summarized under "Web Sources". **Your task right now is to summarize the web source summaries.**

Always adhere to the following rules:
* Write only one to two paragraphs.
* Include all URLs from the listed sources. Format them as Markdown hyperlinks.
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the summaries.
* Include references (<image:k>) to all relevant images.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland amid Iran's missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024."

## Actions
```
web_search("Netanyahu Poland October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest)) reported on January 9, 2025, that Poland will protect Benjamin Netanyahu from potential arrest, as he may attend the 80th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp on January 27, 2025. The article mentions an arrest warrant issued by the International Criminal Court (ICC) for alleged war crimes. <image:1>

The Los Angeles Times ([https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event](https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event)) also reported on January 9, 2025, that the Polish President is seeking protection for Netanyahu if he attends the Auschwitz anniversary event. DW.COM ([https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468](https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468)) reported on January 22, 2025, that the Polish government guaranteed safe passage to Netanyahu, should he attend the event, and that Netanyahu was not planning to attend. <image:k> <image:k>


## Elaboration
The evidence indicates that in January 2025, Poland was preparing to protect Netanyahu from potential arrest, possibly related to an ICC warrant, if he attended the Auschwitz anniversary. However, the evidence does not mention any events from October 1, 2024, or an Iranian missile attack. The evidence also states that Netanyahu was not planning to attend the event.

Therefore, the claim cannot be verified based on the provided evidence. The evidence does not support the claim that Netanyahu fled to Poland on October 1, 2024.

To verify the claim, information about Netanyahu's whereabouts on October 1, 2024, and any related events, such as an Iranian missile attack, would be needed.


## Actions
```
web_search("Iran missile attack Israel October 1 2024")
web_search("Netanyahu whereabouts October 1 2024")
```

## Web Sources
**Web Search Result**

From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_drone_attack_on_Benjamin_Netanyahu%27s_residence): 
Content: The Wikipedia article "2024 drone attack on Benjamin Netanyahu's residence" states that on October 19, 2024, a drone strike targeted Netanyahu's home in Caesarea, Israel. The attack was part of the ongoing conflict between Israel and Hezbollah. Netanyahu called the attack an attempted assassination by Iranian proxies. Hezbollah claimed responsibility for the attack on October 22, 2024. <image:1>

DevelopPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved new Evidence. Now, **analyze the Claim's veracity using the evidence**. Always adhere to the following rules:
* Focus on developing new insights. Do not repeat larger parts from the Record. Do not restate the Claim.
* Write down your thoughts step-by-step. Whenever necessary, you may elaborate in more detail.
* Depending on the topic's complexity, invest one to three paragraphs. The fewer, the better.
* If you find that there is insufficient information to verify the Claim, explicitly state what information is missing.
* If you cite web sources, always refer to them by including their URL as a Markdown hyperlink.
* **Use information only from the recorded evidence**: Avoid inserting information that is not implied by the evidence. You may use commonsense knowledge, though.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland amid Iran's missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024."

## Actions
```
web_search("Netanyahu Poland October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest)) reported on January 9, 2025, that Poland will protect Benjamin Netanyahu from potential arrest, as he may attend the 80th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp on January 27, 2025. The article mentions an arrest warrant issued by the International Criminal Court (ICC) for alleged war crimes. <image:1>

The Los Angeles Times ([https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event](https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event)) also reported on January 9, 2025, that the Polish President is seeking protection for Netanyahu if he attends the Auschwitz anniversary event. DW.COM ([https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468](https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468)) reported on January 22, 2025, that the Polish government guaranteed safe passage to Netanyahu, should he attend the event, and that Netanyahu was not planning to attend. <image:k> <image:k>


## Elaboration
The evidence indicates that in January 2025, Poland was preparing to protect Netanyahu from potential arrest, possibly related to an ICC warrant, if he attended the Auschwitz anniversary. However, the evidence does not mention any events from October 1, 2024, or an Iranian missile attack. The evidence also states that Netanyahu was not planning to attend the event.

Therefore, the claim cannot be verified based on the provided evidence. The evidence does not support the claim that Netanyahu fled to Poland on October 1, 2024.

To verify the claim, information about Netanyahu's whereabouts on October 1, 2024, and any related events, such as an Iranian missile attack, would be needed.


## Actions
```
web_search("Iran missile attack Israel October 1 2024")
web_search("Netanyahu whereabouts October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
On October 1, 2024, Iran launched a missile attack on Israel, also known as "Operation True Promise II" according to a Wikipedia article ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/October_2024_Iranian_strikes_on_Israel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/October_2024_Iranian_strikes_on_Israel)). NPR ([https://www.npr.org/2024/10/01/g-s1-25707/iran-israel-hezbollah-lebanon-attack](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/01/g-s1-25707/iran-israel-hezbollah-lebanon-attack)) and Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/10/1/irans-missile-attack-against-israel-what-we-know-and-what-comes-next](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/10/1/irans-missile-attack-against-israel-what-we-know-and-what-comes-next)) also reported on the attack. Benjamin Netanyahu responded to the attack, calling it a "big mistake." <image:1> <image:281> <image:282>



### Evidence from `web_search`
The Wikipedia article ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_drone_attack_on_Benjamin_Netanyahu%27s_residence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_drone_attack_on_Benjamin_Netanyahu%27s_residence)) states that on October 19, 2024, a drone strike targeted Netanyahu's home in Caesarea, Israel, which Hezbollah claimed responsibility for on October 22, 2024. NPR ([https://www.npr.org/2024/10/19/nx-s1-5158375/netanyahu-house-drone-israel](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/19/nx-s1-5158375/netanyahu-house-drone-israel)) reported on October 19, 2024, about the drone attack on Netanyahu's house. The BBC ([https://www.bbc.com/news/live/c4g77k4jl68t](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/c4g77k4jl68t)) provided live updates on October 21, 2024, including reports of Israeli strikes on Iran and Hezbollah. <image:13867>, <image:13870>, <image:13872>, <image:13878>, <image:13879>, <image:13880>, <image:13881>, <image:13882>, <image:13883>


# Your Analysis



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The evidence confirms that Iran launched a missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024. The evidence also indicates that Netanyahu responded to the attack, calling it a "big mistake." However, the evidence does not state that Netanyahu left Israel or fled to Poland.

Therefore, the claim is not supported by the evidence.

_________________________



JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland amid Iran's missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024."

## Actions
```

```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`

SummarizeDocPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You are provided with the record of a fact-check. It contains the Claim to be verified and a documentation of all the fact-checking work along the gathered evidence. Your task is to **summarize the fact-check**. That is, you provide a concise, one-paragraph justification for the final VERDICT based on the knowledge from the Record. Note:
* Be truthful, brief, do not add any additional information besides the information given in the Record. 
* Link key sources in your summary. Use Markdown notation for that. You may link them in-line.
* Don't state the Claim again. Rather focus on the key insights of the fact-check.
* Simply print just the summary.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland amid Iran's missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024."

## Actions
```
web_search("Netanyahu Poland October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/1/9/poland-says-it-will-protect-benjamin-netanyahu-from-potential-arrest)) reported on January 9, 2025, that Poland will protect Benjamin Netanyahu from potential arrest, as he may attend the 80th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp on January 27, 2025. The article mentions an arrest warrant issued by the International Criminal Court (ICC) for alleged war crimes. <image:1>

The Los Angeles Times ([https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event](https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2025-01-09/polish-president-seeks-protection-for-netanyahu-if-he-attends-auschwitz-anniversary-event)) also reported on January 9, 2025, that the Polish President is seeking protection for Netanyahu if he attends the Auschwitz anniversary event. DW.COM ([https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468](https://www.dw.com/en/auschwitz-poland-netanyahu-arrest-pledge/a-71377468)) reported on January 22, 2025, that the Polish government guaranteed safe passage to Netanyahu, should he attend the event, and that Netanyahu was not planning to attend. <image:k> <image:k>


## Elaboration
The evidence indicates that in January 2025, Poland was preparing to protect Netanyahu from potential arrest, possibly related to an ICC warrant, if he attended the Auschwitz anniversary. However, the evidence does not mention any events from October 1, 2024, or an Iranian missile attack. The evidence also states that Netanyahu was not planning to attend the event.

Therefore, the claim cannot be verified based on the provided evidence. The evidence does not support the claim that Netanyahu fled to Poland on October 1, 2024.

To verify the claim, information about Netanyahu's whereabouts on October 1, 2024, and any related events, such as an Iranian missile attack, would be needed.


## Actions
```
web_search("Iran missile attack Israel October 1 2024")
web_search("Netanyahu whereabouts October 1 2024")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
On October 1, 2024, Iran launched a missile attack on Israel, also known as "Operation True Promise II" according to a Wikipedia article ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/October_2024_Iranian_strikes_on_Israel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/October_2024_Iranian_strikes_on_Israel)). NPR ([https://www.npr.org/2024/10/01/g-s1-25707/iran-israel-hezbollah-lebanon-attack](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/01/g-s1-25707/iran-israel-hezbollah-lebanon-attack)) and Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/10/1/irans-missile-attack-against-israel-what-we-know-and-what-comes-next](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/10/1/irans-missile-attack-against-israel-what-we-know-and-what-comes-next)) also reported on the attack. Benjamin Netanyahu responded to the attack, calling it a "big mistake." <image:1> <image:281> <image:282>



### Evidence from `web_search`
The Wikipedia article ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_drone_attack_on_Benjamin_Netanyahu%27s_residence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_drone_attack_on_Benjamin_Netanyahu%27s_residence)) states that on October 19, 2024, a drone strike targeted Netanyahu's home in Caesarea, Israel, which Hezbollah claimed responsibility for on October 22, 2024. NPR ([https://www.npr.org/2024/10/19/nx-s1-5158375/netanyahu-house-drone-israel](https://www.npr.org/2024/10/19/nx-s1-5158375/netanyahu-house-drone-israel)) reported on October 19, 2024, about the drone attack on Netanyahu's house. The BBC ([https://www.bbc.com/news/live/c4g77k4jl68t](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/c4g77k4jl68t)) provided live updates on October 21, 2024, including reports of Israeli strikes on Iran and Hezbollah. <image:13867>, <image:13870>, <image:13872>, <image:13878>, <image:13879>, <image:13880>, <image:13881>, <image:13882>, <image:13883>


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that Iran launched a missile attack on Israel on October 1, 2024. The evidence also indicates that Netanyahu responded to the attack, calling it a "big mistake." However, the evidence does not state that Netanyahu left Israel or fled to Poland.

Therefore, the claim is not supported by the evidence.


## Final Judgement
The evidence confirms that an Iranian missile attack on Israel occurred on October 1, 2024, and that Netanyahu responded to it. However, there is no evidence to support the claim that Netanyahu left Israel and fled to Poland on that date.

`false`

## Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The claim is false. While an Iranian missile attack on Israel occurred on October 1, 2024, and Netanyahu responded to it, there is no evidence to support the claim that he left Israel and fled to Poland on that date.

PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `reverse_search`
   * Description: Performs a reverse image search to find similar images on the web.
   * How to use: Provide an image and the model will perform a reverse search to find similar images.
   * Format: reverse_search(<image:k>), where `k` is the image's ID

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

# Example: reverse_search()

## Claim
Text: "<image:k> shows a rare event of a solar eclipse with a double ring."

...

## Actions
```
reverse_search(<image:k>)
```

# Example: image_search()

## Claim
Text: "Chinese officials in white protective hazmat suits carried people down a hallway to be quarantined for having COVID-19 in November 2022."

...

ACTIONS:
```
image_search("China officials white suits carry people")
image_search("China officials carry people COVID quarantine 2022")
```

Text: "New Zealand’s new Food Bill bans gardening"
Claim date: October 29, 2020

...

web_search("New Zealand Food Bill gardening ban")
```

SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background.

The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

# Search Result
From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza): 
Content: "[Jump to content](#bodyContent)

[Coordinates](/wiki/Geographic_coordinate_system "Geographic coordinate system")
: [31°48′24″N 35°10′44″E﻿ / ﻿31.80667°N 35.17889°E﻿ / 31.80667; 35.17889](https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&params=31_48_24_N_35_10_44_E_region:IL_type:landmark)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Israeli monument in the Arazim Valley of Jerusalem

|     |     |
| --- | --- |9/11 Living Memorial Plaza
| [![](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg/250px-Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg)](/wiki/File:Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg)<br><br>Cenotaph of the complex: an [American flag](/wiki/Flag_of_the_United_States "Flag of the United States")<br> morphing into a [flame of remembrance](/wiki/Candlelight_vigil "Candlelight vigil") |     |
| [![Map](https://maps.wikimedia.org/img/osm-intl,13,31.806666666667,35.178888888889,250x200.png?lang=en&domain=en.wikipedia.org&title=9%2F11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&revid=1286276248&groups=_48a98e9381b706e57ffc5e7da39d009916ba0860)](/wiki/Special:Map/13/31.806666666667/35.178888888889/en) |     |
| Location | [West Jerusalem](/wiki/West_Jerusalem "West Jerusalem")<br>, Israel |
| Coordinates | [31°48′24″N 35°10′44″E﻿ / ﻿31.80667°N 35.17889°E﻿ / 31.80667; 35.17889](https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&params=31_48_24_N_35_10_44_E_region:IL_type:landmark) |
| Designer | [Eliezer Weishoff](/wiki/Eliezer_Weishoff "Eliezer Weishoff") |
| Material | Granite, bronze, aluminum |
| Opening date | 12 November 2009 |
| Dedicated to | Victims of the [September 11 attacks](/wiki/September_11_attacks "September 11 attacks") |

The **9/11 Living Memorial Plaza** ([Hebrew](/wiki/Hebrew_language "Hebrew language")
: האנדרטה לזכר קרבנות אסון מגדלי התאומים) consists of an Israeli [cenotaph](/wiki/Cenotaph "Cenotaph")
 surrounded by a larger complex near [Ramot, Jerusalem](/wiki/Ramot,_East_Jerusalem "Ramot, East Jerusalem")
. It was built on 5 acres (2.0 ha) of land, having been completed in 2009, and had been designed by Israeli artist [Eliezer Weishoff](/wiki/Eliezer_Weishoff "Eliezer Weishoff")
 to honour the victims of the [September 11 attacks](/wiki/September_11_attacks "September 11 attacks")
, which were carried out by [al-Qaeda](/wiki/Al-Qaeda "Al-Qaeda")
 against the [United States](/wiki/United_States "United States")
 in 2001.

Construction
------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=1 "Edit section: Construction")\
\]

[![The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza Complex](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg/250px-911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg)](/wiki/File:911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg)

The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza Complex

The cenotaph measures 30 feet and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. Cunningham")
, members of the Israeli Cabinet and legislature, the families of victims and others.[\[1\]](#cite_note-JPost-1)
[\[5\]](#cite_note-Haaretz-5)

Commemorations
--------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=3 "Edit section: Commemorations")\
\]

The 2013 memorial for the 9/11 attacks was commemorated at Living Memorial Plaza. Shapiro")
 commented during the ceremony: "Here, at this painfully beautiful memorial site, we are a reminder to everyone that we, Americans and Israelis, stand together in a spirit of solidarity and commitment to the future."[\[1\]](#cite_note-JPost-1)

In Israeli society
------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=4 "Edit section: In Israeli society")\
\]

Israel has issued postage stamps with the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza pictured, as a tribute to the World Trade Center victims. Also, Israel Coins and Medals Corp issues medal for 9/11 victims with the image of Living Memorial.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)
[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)

Additional monuments
--------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=5 "Edit section: Additional monuments")\
\]

Following the 2018 [Pittsburgh synagogue shooting](/wiki/Pittsburgh_synagogue_shooting "Pittsburgh synagogue shooting")
, the Jewish National Fund and JNF-USA erected a stone plaque listing the names of the 11 victims of that attack next to the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza. In February 2019, Pittsburgh mayor [Bill Peduto](/wiki/Bill_Peduto "Bill Peduto")
 visited the synagogue memorial and planted an olive tree beside it "as a symbol of peace and continuity".[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

Gallery
-------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=6 "Edit section: Gallery")\
\]

*   [![Names of 9/11 victims](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/39/T%27win_Towers_memorial_in_Israel-Names_of_the_Victims.jpg/250px-T%27win_Towers_memorial_in_Israel-Names_of_the_Victims.jpg)](/wiki/File:T%27win_Towers_memorial_in_Israel-Names_of_the_Victims.jpg "Names of 9/11 victims")
    
    Names of 9/11 victims

    General view of the monument in front of the [Har HaMenuchot](/wiki/Har_HaMenuchot "Har HaMenuchot")

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search result is from Wikipedia and describes the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. <image:50> The memorial was designed by Eliezer Weishoff and dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. It was completed in 2009. The cenotaph is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The article also includes several images of the memorial.

SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

# Search Result
From [Source](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx): 
Content: "  

[](/?catid=%7BE4819479-E363-4E8D-A5C6-82DFC827CC30%7D "Link to external site")

KKL-JNF Tourism Notifications
-----------------------------

[](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/messages/)

Additional info

Close Notifications

9/11 Living Memorial
====================

Click here to print

[](mailto:?Subject=KKL_New-9/11 Living Memorial&Body=https%3a%2f%2fwww.kkl-jnf.org%2ftourism-and-recreation%2fscenic-lookouts%2fcenter%2ftwin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx "SHARE MAIL")

Click here to share

**Hebrew name:** Andartat HaTeomim  
  
**Location:** Jerusalem Park  
  
**Description:** An memorial established by KKL-JNF in the heart of Natua Forest, on top of a hill overlooking Ha’arazim Valley and Nahal Soreq. 
  
**Directions:** From Golda Meir Avenue in Jerusalem (Route 436), for those coming from the north, near the Golda Meir Interchange.

The 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. 
Memorial plaques on the wall around the plaza commemorate the nearly 3000 names of people who perished in the disaster, including five Israelis. 
Below the memorial is the Einot Telem National Park, featuring small springs that flow from the stone precipice, and the remains of the small Jewish settlement Beit Talma, which was built in 1906 and eventually abandoned. In the heart of this plaza, artist Eliezer Weishoff has installed a large 9-meter tall bronze sculpture."

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search result from KKL-JNF describes the 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. <image:50> The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis.

Always adhere to the following rules:
* Write only one to two paragraphs.
* Include all URLs from the listed sources. Format them as Markdown hyperlinks.
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the summaries.
* Include references (<image:k>) to all relevant images.

Content: The search result is from Wikipedia and describes the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. <image:50> The memorial was designed by Eliezer Weishoff and dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. It was completed in 2009. The cenotaph is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The article also includes several images of the memorial.


From [Source](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx): 
Content: The search result from KKL-JNF describes the 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. <image:50> The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).

DevelopPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved new Evidence. Now, **analyze the Claim's veracity using the evidence**. Always adhere to the following rules:
* Focus on developing new insights. Do not repeat larger parts from the Record. Do not restate the Claim.
* Write down your thoughts step-by-step. Whenever necessary, you may elaborate in more detail.
* Depending on the topic's complexity, invest one to three paragraphs. The fewer, the better.
* If you find that there is insufficient information to verify the Claim, explicitly state what information is missing.
* If you cite web sources, always refer to them by including their URL as a Markdown hyperlink.
* **Use information only from the recorded evidence**: Avoid inserting information that is not implied by the evidence. You may use commonsense knowledge, though.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


# Your Analysis



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.

_________________________



JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


# Your Judgement



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009. However, the provided evidence does not confirm whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

`not enough information`

PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `reverse_search`
   * Description: Performs a reverse image search to find similar images on the web.
   * How to use: Provide an image and the model will perform a reverse search to find similar images.
   * Format: reverse_search(<image:k>), where `k` is the image's ID

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

# Example: reverse_search()

## Claim
Text: "<image:k> shows a rare event of a solar eclipse with a double ring."

...

## Actions
```
reverse_search(<image:k>)
```

# Example: image_search()

## Claim
Text: "Chinese officials in white protective hazmat suits carried people down a hallway to be quarantined for having COVID-19 in November 2022."

...

ACTIONS:
```
image_search("China officials white suits carry people")
image_search("China officials carry people COVID quarantine 2022")
```

# Example: web_search()

## Claim
Text: "New Zealand’s new Food Bill bans gardening"
Claim date: October 29, 2020

...

## Actions
```
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill 2020")
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill gardening ban")
```

The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).

The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


## Actions
```
web_search("other 9/11 memorials outside US")
```

SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Search Result
From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks): 
Content: "The memorial is dedicated to the five individuals at the Pentagon whose remains were never found, and the partial remains of another 25 victims are buried beneath the memorial.[\[95\]](#cite_note-Cass-95)
 The names of the 184 victims of the Pentagon attack are inscribed on the memorial's side.

On September 11, 2002, the documentary play _[Bystander 9/11](/wiki/Bystander_9/11 "Bystander 9/11")
_ was performed at [Church of the Transfiguration, Episcopal (Manhattan)](/wiki/Church_of_the_Transfiguration,_Episcopal_(Manhattan) "Church of the Transfiguration, Episcopal (Manhattan)")
, the play has since been published and has been regularly performed on the anniversary of the event, with numerous performances around the United States on the 20th anniversary.

A 9/11 memorial public sculpture by Ingrid Lahti was on display at [Bellevue Downtown Park](/wiki/Bellevue_Downtown_Park "Bellevue Downtown Park")
, [Bellevue, Washington](/wiki/Bellevue,_Washington "Bellevue, Washington")
; it was installed September 11, 2002 and displayed through October.[\[96\]](#cite_note-96)
[\[97\]](#cite_note-97)

10th anniversary memorial services
----------------------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=10 "Edit section: 10th anniversary memorial services")\
\]

Many organizations held memorial services and events for the 10th anniversary of the attacks.

*   The official New York City observance of the 10th anniversary of September 11 took place at the World Trade Center site at 8:40 am – 12:30 pm Sunday, September 11, 2011. Robertson")

Memorials and services for the September 11 attacks

2 languages [Add topic](#) The memorial composed a section of steel I-beam from one of the towers of the World Trade Center and on the base holding the steel beam has 4 plaques remembering the victims of 9/11[\[70\]](#cite_note-70)
    
*   On September 11, 2013, [Bremerton, Washington](/wiki/Bremerton,_Washington "Bremerton, Washington")
    , dedicated the Central Kitsap 9/11 Memorial at Evergreen Park, including steel girders from the World Trade Center, limestone from the Pentagon, and sand from the Shanksville, Pennsylvania crash site[\[71\]](#cite_note-71)
    
*   Outside the [Air Mobility Command Museum](/wiki/Air_Mobility_Command_Museum "Air Mobility Command Museum")
     building near [Dover, Delaware](/wiki/Dover,_Delaware "Dover, Delaware")
    , there is a 9/11 memorial consisting of two pieces of steel from the North Tower, a rock from the United Airlines Flight 93 crash site, and a block from the Pentagon. It features a 6,600-pound piece of debris, given by the [Port Authority of New York and New Jersey](/wiki/Port_Authority_of_New_York_and_New_Jersey "Port Authority of New York and New Jersey")
    .[\[77\]](#cite_note-77)
    
*   In 2015 the two intact [Port Authority Trans-Hudson](/wiki/Port_Authority_Trans-Hudson "Port Authority Trans-Hudson")
     cars saved from the WTC station were donated, one each to the [Trolley Museum of New York](/wiki/Trolley_Museum_of_New_York "Trolley Museum of New York")
    [\[78\]](#cite_note-78)
     and the [Shore Line Trolley Museum](/wiki/Shore_Line_Trolley_Museum "Shore Line Trolley Museum")
    .[\[79\]](#cite_note-79)
     These cars were saved by the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey originally for use by the [National September 11 Memorial & Museum](/wiki/National_September_11_Memorial_%26_Museum "National September 11 Memorial & Museum")
     but it was decided to make these cars available to other museums instead.
*   In August 2012, a memorial was opened along the [Schuylkill River Trail](/wiki/Schuylkill_River_Trail "Schuylkill River Trail")
     in [Philadelphia, Pennsylvania](/wiki/Philadelphia "Philadelphia")
    . The antenna was designed and manufactured by Harris Corporation at its Quincy plant.

#### Other designations

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=6 "Edit section: Other designations")\
\]

*   The [New Britain Museum of American Art](/wiki/New_Britain_Museum_of_American_Art "New Britain Museum of American Art")
     commissioned painter [Graydon Parrish](/wiki/Graydon_Parrish "Graydon Parrish")
     to create the allegorical painting _[The Cycle of Terror and Tragedy](/wiki/The_Cycle_of_Terror_and_Tragedy "The Cycle of Terror and Tragedy")
    _ in memory of New Britain native Scott O'Brien, who was killed in the attacks.[\[83\]](#cite_note-83)
    
*   The [LeRoy W. Proceeds from the concerts went to families of firemen killed in the attacks.
*   October 21, _[United We Stand: What More Can I Give](/wiki/United_We_Stand:_What_More_Can_I_Give "United We Stand: What More Can I Give")
    _
*   December 9, _Hispanos Unidos Por New York_ (_Hispanics United For New York_), a [Latin music](/wiki/Latin_music "Latin music")
     concert held by the [Spanish Broadcasting System](/wiki/Spanish_Broadcasting_System "Spanish Broadcasting System")
     at the [Madison Square Garden](/wiki/Madison_Square_Garden "Madison Square Garden")
    , for both the victims of the September 11 attacks and the crash of [American Airlines Flight 587](/wiki/American_Airlines_Flight_587 "American Airlines Flight 587")
    .[\[92\]](#cite_note-92)
    

### 2002 and later events

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=9 "Edit section: 2002 and later events")\
\]

On February 3, 2002, during the halftime show of [Super Bowl XXXVI](/wiki/Super_Bowl_XXXVI "Super Bowl XXXVI")
, rock group [U2](/wiki/U2 "U2")
 performed" [Where the Streets Have No Name](/wiki/Where_the_Streets_Have_No_Name "Where the Streets Have No Name")
", while the names of the victims were projected onto banners. Hundreds of citizens assembled during the remembrance ceremony held for the Tenth Anniversary on Sunday, September 11.

20th anniversary memorial services
----------------------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=11 "Edit section: 20th anniversary memorial services")\
\]

The 20th anniversary came just weeks after a hastened [withdrawal of United States troops from Afghanistan](/wiki/Withdrawal_of_United_States_troops_from_Afghanistan_(2020%E2%80%932021) "Withdrawal of United States troops from Afghanistan (2020–2021)")
 following the [2021 Taliban offensive](/wiki/2021_Taliban_offensive "2021 Taliban offensive")
 in which the [Taliban](/wiki/Taliban "Taliban")
 reconquered most of Afghanistan. We have built this memorial because, to be blunt, the world needed it done years ago, and the two years longer to await the completion of the _Reflected Absence_ memorial in New York city (by Michael Arad and Peter Walker) was in our opinion two years too long.[\[118\]](#cite_note-sl-crnyc-ann-118)

*   World Trade Center Memorial (_Second Life_)[\[119\]](#cite_note-sl-wtcm-119)
     is focused on the victims of 9/11, reminiscent of the Memorial Wall of the [Vietnam Veterans Memorial](/wiki/Vietnam_Veterans_Memorial "Vietnam Veterans Memorial")
    .

### Planned September 11 memorials

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=15 "Edit section: Planned September 11 memorials")\
\]

*   Palm Harbor 9/11 Memorial, [Palm Harbor, Florida](/wiki/Palm_Harbor,_Florida "Palm Harbor, Florida")
     – This memorial broke ground on March 30, 2012[\[update\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit)
    . George Esplanade, [Staten Island](/wiki/Staten_Island "Staten Island")
    
*   [![Memorial sign of the New York City Fire Dept.](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/40/Novaiorqueplaca.JPG/120px-Novaiorqueplaca.JPG)](/wiki/File:Novaiorqueplaca.JPG "Memorial sign of the New York City Fire Dept.")

    _: New Jersey State 9/11 Memorial

    , which lost four citizens in the attacks.

     in 2008

    [Fulton County 9/11 Memorial](/wiki/Fulton_County_Fair#9.2F11_Memorial "Fulton County Fair")
    , Ohio

| Response | *   [U.S."

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The Wikipedia article "Memorials and services for the September 11 attacks" lists several 9/11 memorials, including the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem. The article also mentions memorials in Bremerton, Washington, Dover, Delaware, and Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, among others. The article does not explicitly state that the Jerusalem memorial is the only one outside the US.

_________________________



SummarizeSummariesPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved web sources, each one summarized under "Web Sources". **Your task right now is to summarize the web source summaries.**

Always adhere to the following rules:
* Write only one to two paragraphs.
* Include all URLs from the listed sources. Format them as Markdown hyperlinks.
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the summaries.
* Include references (<image:k>) to all relevant images.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


## Actions
```
web_search("other 9/11 memorials outside US")
```

## Web Sources
**Web Search Result**

From [Source](https://voicescenter.org/living-memorial/memorials/by-country): 
Content: The search result lists numerous 9/11 memorials located outside the US, including memorials in Australia, Canada, China, France, Iceland, India, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, Puerto Rico, South Korea, Spain, Ukraine, and the United Kingdom.


From [Source](http://www.memorialmapping.com/memorials/browse-by-country): 
Content: The search result from Memorial Mapping lists several countries with 9/11 memorials, including Afghanistan, Australia, Barbados, Bermuda, Brazil, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Kuwait, Lithuania, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Portugal, Republic of Georgia, Spain, and the United Kingdom. The number of memorials in each country is also provided.


From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks): 
Content: The Wikipedia article "Memorials and services for the September 11 attacks" lists several 9/11 memorials, including the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem. The article also mentions memorials in Bremerton, Washington, Dover, Delaware, and Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, among others. The article does not explicitly state that the Jerusalem memorial is the only one outside the US.


## Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search results indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US. Memorials are listed in various countries, including Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, and the United Kingdom. <image:50>
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one of these memorials.

_________________________



DevelopPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved new Evidence. Now, **analyze the Claim's veracity using the evidence**. Always adhere to the following rules:
* Focus on developing new insights. Do not repeat larger parts from the Record. Do not restate the Claim.
* Write down your thoughts step-by-step. Whenever necessary, you may elaborate in more detail.
* Depending on the topic's complexity, invest one to three paragraphs. The fewer, the better.
* If you find that there is insufficient information to verify the Claim, explicitly state what information is missing.
* If you cite web sources, always refer to them by including their URL as a Markdown hyperlink.
* **Use information only from the recorded evidence**: Avoid inserting information that is not implied by the evidence. You may use commonsense knowledge, though.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


## Actions
```
web_search("other 9/11 memorials outside US")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The search results indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US. Memorials are listed in various countries, including Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, and the United Kingdom. <image:50>
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one of these memorials.


# Your Analysis



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The evidence confirms that the image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, the claim that it is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false. The search results show that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US, in various countries.

_________________________



JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


## Actions
```
web_search("other 9/11 memorials outside US")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The search results indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US. Memorials are listed in various countries, including Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, and the United Kingdom. <image:50>
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one of these memorials.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, the claim that it is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false. The search results show that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US, in various countries.


# Your Judgement



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, the claim that this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false. Multiple memorials exist outside the US.

`false`
_________________________



SummarizeDocPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You are provided with the record of a fact-check. It contains the Claim to be verified and a documentation of all the fact-checking work along the gathered evidence. Your task is to **summarize the fact-check**. That is, you provide a concise, one-paragraph justification for the final VERDICT based on the knowledge from the Record. Note:
* Be truthful, brief, do not add any additional information besides the information given in the Record. 
* Link key sources in your summary. Use Markdown notation for that. You may link them in-line.
* Don't state the Claim again. Rather focus on the key insights of the fact-check.
* Simply print just the summary.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is described in the search results. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, was completed in 2009 and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The memorial includes plaques commemorating the victims of the 9/11 attacks, including five Israelis. <image:50>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and was established by KKL-JNF. The sources are from Wikipedia ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)) and KKL-JNF ([https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx)).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial was completed in 2009 and is located in Jerusalem Park.

The evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US. Therefore, the claim cannot be fully verified.


## Actions
```
web_search("other 9/11 memorials outside US")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The search results indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US. Memorials are listed in various countries, including Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, and the United Kingdom. <image:50>
The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one of these memorials.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, the claim that it is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false. The search results show that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the US, in various countries.


## Final Judgement
The image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, the claim that this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false. Multiple memorials exist outside the US.

`false`

## Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. However, contrary to the claim, this is not the only 9/11 memorial outside the US; there are multiple memorials in various countries, as evidenced by search results ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)).

_________________________



PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `reverse_search`
   * Description: Performs a reverse image search to find similar images on the web.
   * How to use: Provide an image and the model will perform a reverse search to find similar images.
   * Format: reverse_search(<image:k>), where `k` is the image's ID

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

# Example: reverse_search()

## Claim
Text: "<image:k> shows a rare event of a solar eclipse with a double ring."

...

## Actions
```
reverse_search(<image:k>)
```

# Example: image_search()

```

```

```

* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.
